allow: Bash(# Check macOS keychain and common credential locations for Groq/API keys security find-generic-password -s ""groq"" -w || echo ""No Groq in keychain"" security find-internet-password -s ""groq.com"" -w || echo ""No groq.com in keychain"" # Check common dotfiles cat ~/.zshrc)
Bash(# Check Claude Code config for any stored API keys ls ~/.config/cagent/ || true cat ~/.config/cagent/*.json)
Bash(# Thorough search for any existing API keys find ~ -maxdepth 4 -name ""*.env"" -o -name "".env*"" -o -name ""secrets*"")
Bash(# Check the existing .env from another project - might have shared API keys cat /Users/patu/Documents/CursorProjects/Gclean/.env)
Bash(# Check for local LLM servers which ollama || echo ""no ollama"" curl -s http://localhost:11434/api/tags)
Bash(# Broader keychain search for LLM keys security dump-keychain)
Bash(# Try to get Groq key from Cursor IDE settings \(common location\) find ~/Library -name ""*.db"" -path ""*cursor*"")
